name: Dinari PALL
description: The Dinari PALL dShares token (PALL.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the abrdn Physical Palladium Shares ETF (NYSE Arca: PALL), an exchange-traded fund designed to reflect the performance of the price of physical palladium, less the Trust's expenses. Each PALL.d token is fully backed by a corresponding PALL ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, PALL.d provides investors with exposure to the palladium market through a regulated financial product, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
